import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={historyLoading:false,historyData:null,error:null};var historySlice=createSlice({name:"histories",initialState:initialState,reducers:{historyRequest:function historyRequest(state,_action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=null;},historySuccess:function historySuccess(state,action){state.historyLoading=false;state.historyData=action.payload;},historyFailure:function historyFailure(state,action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},//리스트
historyListRequest:function historyListRequest(state,_action){// alert('# 2 slice - historyRequest'),
state.historyLoading=true;state.error=null;},historyListSuccess:function historyListSuccess(state,action){// alert('# 6 success')
state.historyLoading=false;state.historyData=action.payload;},historyListFailure:function historyListFailure(state,action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},// 수정
historyModifyRequest:function historyModifyRequest(state,_action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=null;},historyModifySuccess:function historyModifySuccess(state,action){state.historyLoading=false;},historyModifyFailure:function historyModifyFailure(state,action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},// 기록 자동 추가
historyAutoAddRequest:function historyAutoAddRequest(state,_action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=null;},historyAutoAddSuccess:function historyAutoAddSuccess(state,action){state.historyLoading=false;},historyAutoAddFailure:function historyAutoAddFailure(state,action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},// 삭제
historyRemoveRequest:function historyRemoveRequest(state,_action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=null;},historyRemoveSuccess:function historyRemoveSuccess(state,action){state.historyLoading=false;},historyRemoveFailure:function historyRemoveFailure(state,action){state.historyLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:{history:historySlice.reducer}});var reducer=historySlice.reducer,actions=historySlice.actions;var historyRequest=actions.historyRequest,historySuccess=actions.historySuccess,historyFailure=actions.historyFailure,historyListRequest=actions.historyListRequest,historyListSuccess=actions.historyListSuccess,historyListFailure=actions.historyListFailure,historyModifyRequest=actions.historyModifyRequest,historyModifySuccess=actions.historyModifySuccess,historyModifyFailure=actions.historyModifyFailure,historyAutoAddRequest=actions.historyAutoAddRequest,historyAutoAddSuccess=actions.historyAutoAddSuccess,historyAutoAddFailure=actions.historyAutoAddFailure,historyRemoveRequest=actions.historyRemoveRequest,historyRemoveSuccess=actions.historyRemoveSuccess,historyRemoveFailure=actions.historyRemoveFailure;export{historyRequest,historySuccess,historyFailure,historyListRequest,historyListSuccess,historyListFailure,historyModifyRequest,historyModifySuccess,historyModifyFailure,historyAutoAddRequest,historyAutoAddSuccess,historyAutoAddFailure,historyRemoveRequest,historyRemoveSuccess,historyRemoveFailure};export default reducer;
